Misc Services à®ªà®¿à®± à®šà¯‡à®µà¯ˆà®•à®³à¯

Pondicherry Day Trip à®ªà®¾à®£à¯à®Ÿà®¿à®šà¯à®šà¯‡à®°à®¿ Day Trip

Escape to the French Riviera of the East. Visit the serene Auroville, the beautiful Promenade Beach, Manakula Vinayagar Temple, and the French Colony. Perfect for a one-day getaway with family or friends. Escape to the French Riviera of the East. Visit the serene Auroville, the beautiful Promenade Beach, Manakula Vinayagar Temple, and the French Colony. Perfect for a one-day getaway with family or friends.

Route Plan à®ªà®¯à®£à®¤à¯ à®¤à®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà®®à¯

1

Chennai Start

Early morning pickup (6:00 AM recommended).

2

Auroville

Visit the Matrimandir viewing point and global township.

3

Aurobindo Ashram

Spiritual pause at the famous ashram.

4

Manakula Vinayagar

Blessings at the ancient Ganesha temple.

5

Promenade Beach

Relax at the Rock Beach & French Colony walk.

6

Chennai Drop

Return by night (approx 9:00 PM).

Service Details & Information à®šà¯‡à®µà¯ˆ à®µà®¿à®µà®°à®™à¯à®•à®³à¯

Service Overview à®šà¯‡à®µà¯ˆ à®•à®£à¯à®£à¯‹à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà®®à¯

Pondicherry (Puducherry) was a French colonial settlement until 1954. It is famous for its French Quarter architecture, Auroville, and spiritual heritage of Sri Aurobindo Ashram. Pondicherry (Puducherry) was a French colonial settlement until 1954. It is famous for its French Quarter architecture, Auroville, and spiritual heritage of Sri Aurobindo Ashram.
